name: Sigil Shooter (nizbel)
description:
STORY

You are a Sigil Shooter, a conjurer of magic through sigil circles.  A powerful witch lies before you, but darkness took ahold of her. Defeat her before it's too late!

Play in full screen to avoid mouse glitches!

Developed for 7dfps 2022 game jam.

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD / Arrows

Shoot: Mouse left / Space bar

Levitate: Q/E

CREDITS

Nizbel: Game designer, Programmer

Sprites

Witch: Gilgaphoenixignis

Magic circles: Image by macrovector on Freepik

Health bars: Paul Wortmann

Skybox: Mayhem

Hands: Ragnar Random

Audio

Fireball: Julien Matthey

Battle Music: Matthew Pablo

Menu Music: Brandon Morris

UI: Kenney

Electricity: Sound Effect from Pixabay

Fonts

Sigil

Retron 2000
